## Template

```markdown
# TODOTRACKER: [FEAT-XXX Feature Name]

**Status:**  In Progress  
**Progress:** 40% (4/10 tasks complete)  
**Last Updated:** 2025-11-08

---

## Tasks

### Phase 1: Foundation
-  Create file structure
-  Define TypeScript types
-  Set up component skeletons (IN PROGRESS)
-  Create API endpoint structure

### Phase 2: Logic
-  Implement custom hook
-  Implement API endpoint
-  Create utility functions

### Phase 3: UI
-  Build main component
-  Build form subcomponent
-  Add loading/error states

### Phase 4: Testing
-  Write unit tests
-  Write component tests
-  Manual testing

### Phase 5: Docs
-  Update FILE_STRUCTURE.md
-  Add code comments
-  Update README.md

---

## Git Tags

- `FEAT-XXX-foundation` - Phase 1 complete
- `FEAT-XXX-logic` - Phase 2 complete
- `FEAT-XXX-ui` - Phase 3 complete
- `FEAT-XXX-complete` - All done
```
